mapper.sql: id AS id, is_delete AS isDelete, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modified AS gmtModified, username AS username, password AS password, real_name AS realName, manager_id AS managerId
mapper.select: select * from lz_user where id=#{id} and is_delete = 0 limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into lz_user( username, password, real_name, manager_id, is_delete, gmt_create, gmt_modified )values( #{ username}, #{ password}, #{ realName}, #{ managerId}, 0, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update lz_user set is_delete = #{isDelete}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate}, username = #{username}, password = #{password}, real_name = #{realName}, manager_id = #{managerId} ,gmt_modified = now() where id = #{id}
update lz_user set is_delete = 1 where id=#{id} limit 1
